# San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards 2009

8th SFFCC Awards
December 14, 2009
----
Best Picture:
The Hurt Locker
The 8th San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards, honoring the best in film for 2009, were given on 14 December 2009.

*Best Picture:
**The Hurt Locker
*Best Director:
**Kathryn Bigelow - The Hurt Locker
*Best Original Screenplay:
**Inglourious Basterds - Quentin Tarantino
*Best Adapted Screenplay:
**Fantastic Mr. Fox - Wes Anderson
*Best Actor:
**Colin Firth - A Single Man
*Best Actress:
**Meryl Streep - Julie & Julia
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Christian McKay - Me and Orson Welles
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Mo'Nique - Precious
*Best Animated Feature:
**Coraline
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**You, the Living (Du levande) â€¢ Sweden/Germany/France/Denmark/Norway/Japan
*Best Documentary:
**Anvil! The Story of Anvil
*Best Cinematography:
**A Serious Man - Roger Deakins
*Marlon Riggs Award (for courage & vision in the Bay Area film community):
**Frazer Bradshaw - Everything Strange and New [https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1297928/]
** Barry Jenkins - Medicine for Melancholy [https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1133989/]
*Special Citation:
**Sita Sings the Blues
*In Memoriam:
**Rose Kaufman
